body.name: Nokia 110 4G | GSM Unlocked Mobile Phone | Volte | Black | International Version | Not AT&T/Cricket/Verizon Compatible

features: Compatibility: This is a single SIM device and is designed to work with GSM carriers. This product uses a nano SIM card and will support T-Mobile and T-Mobile subsidiaries. This device will not support AT&T, Cricket, Verizon or Verizon/AT&T subsidiaries. Please confirm compatibility with your chosen carrier before purchasing. For support with SIM card or network related issues, please contact your carrier for assistance in connecting your device to the chosen compatible network. Product connection and signal strength are dependent on location and carrier network. Poor or low signal strength may rapidly reduce battery life.
Better connected, better looking, and simpler than ever with large buttons, a 1.8" display, and zoomed menus for easy navigation.
Classic Nokia quality, sleek new design.
Features a rear camera, flashlight, games, internet access. For additional product info please see description and product user guide available for download from this page.
body.description: The Nokia 110 is a future-ready phone packed with such features as; 4G VoLTE connectivity, super easy to navigate zoomed menus and audio Readout assist, wireless and wired FM radio, expandable memory with 32 GB card support, games and built-in torch and camera. Come to think of it, this isn’t just a phone that looks good, it’s a phone that makes you look good. Product is compatible with headphones in the event the built in speaker is not sufficient for your needs.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 3.5 3.5 out of 5 stars 260 ratings 3.5 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Hear the difference Above everything a phone needs to do one thing extremely well - make and receive calls. With the Nokia 110 4G, and its 4G VoLTE voice capabilities, you get HD voice quality that is simply outstanding. Simpler to use than ever before The Nokia 110 4G has zoomed menus to make everything bigger and easier to navigate, while its Readout feature turns text to speech to help you along the way. If only everything in life was this simple. A phone that dials up the quality Sleek, stylish and available in three amazing colours – Yellow, Aqua and Black. And its beauty is more than skin deep, with a reliable battery and a build-quality that’s made to last.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My punishment phone
reviews.reviewText: So I bought this phone for my kids, I have two teenagers and it worked like a charm. The purpose of the phone was to give it to them when they did not preform well in school. They had iphones and I threaten to take their phones away but my wife insisted they needed phones "just in case" there was an emergency. So I bought this phone, my daughter got the phone and was begging for her iphone back. And she got it back after her grades came up.As far as the phone, it worked perfect and didn't have any issues lol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This is a bad phone, don't waste your money and time
reviews.reviewText: This is a mobile phone that was returned by another buyer. The box seal was opened and there was an invalid SIM card in the phone. The communication record contained more than ten call records. The keyboard was broken and the numbers on one side could not be used. I bought one. Garbage, so infuriating, disrespectful to consumers, a waste of my money and time. If Amazon had a zero rating review I wouldn't give it a single point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great basic phone
reviews.reviewText: As one who is looking to 'disconnect' to the outside and 'reconnect' with the inside, this phone is the best that I've tried so far.It has no wifi capacity - a big plus. If you want a bit of data for I don't know what, you can get that through your SIM provider.The buttons are solid and do not jump, skip, or 'double press' as is the case with the other basic Nokia phones. Even typing messages is easy despite the limited keypad.It is responsive and fast.It is small, easy to hold (and could even be called appealing) and easy to read.An excellent choice for getting back to what a phone was meant for, making and receiving calls and, as needed, texts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars good and bad
reviews.reviewText: This actually is very good .I order this phone for my kid go to school when she after schools she can give me a phone call and I will know her she home . Is very good. But the problem is this only she can connect me , but I can’t connect her. No matter how our cell how closer. If I call her ,she phone never ever rings. But if she call me .work !! So this is good phone if you don’t like people call you no one can find you and you can find anyone and price reasonable. But I think I have to return because I can‘t connect my kid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good 'dumb' phone for anyone who's 'old-school'
reviews.reviewText: Got this as I wanted a dumb phone. It apparently has internet but I haven't tried to use it, nor will I be doing so in the future.It's good for its simplicity. It comes with some games, none of which I will be playing.My one criticism is that it somehow started to forward calls to voicemail on its own. Not sure how this happened as I certainly did not select this option, and the phone was receiving calls a few days ago! I had to reset all the call forwarding, call barring settings and turn them all off, but since I never turned them on to begin with; this was rather puzzling.Another odd thing was that it had 3 alarm calls, all set for 8am. None were ever set up by me so that is also rather puzzling.The sound quality is okay, not as good as a smart phone, but that's to be expected.Battery life is pretty good. When the battery gets low, it will start beeping at you.Overall, I think it's good for what it does, a simple phone for phone calls and texts which is why I bought it instead of some fancy smart phone.UPDATE 17 Feb: Have noticed that sometimes, no calls are received and go straight to voicemail. Someone else had commented on this on another review. It's very frustrating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Battery Phone
reviews.reviewText: Great quality for the price, Battery lasts forever as usual by Nokia.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars It doesn't work anymore, the speaker and all the calls sound horrible.
reviews.reviewText: the speaker from the phone (internal) sounds awful , so much I can't understand anything, sounds very broken.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just for calls, and not so easy for me to figure that out
reviews.reviewText: An old guy phone. Lots of choices in the menu. Solid little device.
